capabilityDescription.en: Looks up ISP information for an IP address and adds the information to FlowFile attributes. The ISP data is provided as a MaxMind ISP database. (Note that this is NOT the same as the GeoLite database utilized by some geo enrichment tools). The attribute that contains the IP address to lookup is provided by the 'IP Address Attribute' property. If the name of the attribute provided is 'X', then the the attributes added by enrichment will take the form X.isp.<fieldName>
capabilityDescription.zh: Looks up ISP information for an IP address and adds the information to FlowFile attributes. The ISP data is provided as a MaxMind ISP database. (Note that this is NOT the same as the GeoLite database utilized by some geo enrichment tools). The attribute that contains the IP address to lookup is provided by the 'IP Address Attribute' property. If the name of the attribute provided is 'X', then the the attributes added by enrichment will take the form X.isp.<fieldName>

en.description: Path to Maxmind IP Enrichment Database File

zh.description: Maxmind IP扩展数据库文件的路径

en.description: The Log Level to use when an IP is not found in the database. Accepted values: INFO, DEBUG, WARN, ERROR.

zh.description: The Log Level to use when an IP is not found in the database. Accepted values: INFO, DEBUG, WARN, ERROR.

en.description: The name of an attribute whose value is a dotted decimal IP address for which enrichment should occur

zh.description: 一个属性的名称，其值是一个应该进行浓缩的十进制IP地址

found.en: Where to route flow files after successfully enriching attributes with data provided by database
found.zh: 使用数据库提供的数据成功丰富属性后，将流文件路由到何处

not found.en: Where to route flow files after unsuccessfully enriching attributes because no data was found
not found.zh: 由于找不到数据，未能成功丰富属性后将流文件路由到何处

X.isp.name.en: The name of the ISP associated with the IP address provided
X.isp.name.zh: 与提供的IP地址关联的ISP的名称

X.isp.asn.en: The Autonomous System Number (ASN) identified for the IP address
X.isp.asn.zh: 为IP地址标识的自治系统编号（ASN）

X.isp.lookup.micros.en: The number of microseconds that the geo lookup took
X.isp.lookup.micros.zh: 地理查找所用的微秒数

X.isp.asn.organization.en: The Organization Associated with the ASN identified

X.isp.organization.en: The Organization associated with the IP address provided
X.isp.organization.zh: 与提供的IP地址关联的组织
